import React from 'react' import '../css/Style.css'; import NavBar from './rfc/NavBar'; import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; // Composants Material-UI import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; /** * @author Alex Lajeunesse * @class CreationCommande * @description Gère la page de création et de modification de commandes (affichage, requêtes à l'API, redirection et formulaires) */ export default class CreationCommande extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(); const schema = Yup.object({ entreprise: Yup.string() .allow("") .max(64), nom: Yup.string() .allow("") .max(64), no_compte: Yup.string() .max(9) .pattern(/^\d+$/), telephone: Yup.string() .allow("") .max(32), courriel: Yup.string() .email() .max(255), po_client: Yup.string() .allow("") .max(64), vendeur: Yup.string() .max(4) .required(), commentaire: Yup.string() .allow("") .max(512), attention: Yup.string() .email() .allow("") .max(255) .required() }) .or('entreprise', 'nom') .or('entreprise', 'telephone', 'courriel'); } /** * @author Alex Lajeunesse * @function render * @description Affiche l'interface. * @see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FD50LPJ6bjE */ render() { return (
{ setSubmitting(true); console.log(data); setSubmitting(false); }} > {({ values, isSubmitting, handleChange, handleBlur, handleSubmit }) => ( 
{JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)}
)}
) } }
